descriptionHtml:
Good Afternoon All,

I made this for my own use, but thought it was worth posting, not least to show whats currently possible in modding terms.

This armour replaces the Saviors hide female mesh. Personally I thought the savior\'s hide made you look a little to much like a forsworn so i decided to make it a little more civilised, adding parts from the apprentice mage robe.

Hope you enjoy (and endorse) it ;)

All the best

Dae

-- Installation --

Just extract the meshes and textures folders into your data folder.

--Bugs Reporting etc--

There is some minor clipping, but no worse than the vanilla armours. If you see anything hefty let me know.

-- Compatibility --

Only replaces the female mesh and textures for this armour. It wont effet anything else in game but will clash with any other mod that attempts to change the female savior\'s hide.

-- For modders ---
(just for info)
The mod basically works by hiding some of the armour using an alpha property. The meshes themselves have not been edited. Nifscope was used to put all the mesh parts together then i cut out the bits i didnt want to see on the texture files. 

--Permissions--
there is very little in terms of new resources here. A couple of meshes and a couple of edited textures. If you wish to use them in your own mod, got ahead. A nod in my direction would be much appreciated if you do tho ;)
author: Daejones
